title: WTT or FS: T205 SGC Dupes for Similar Prices added
author: Archive

posts.post_title: WTT or FS: T205 SGC Dupes for Similar Prices added
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Lance
I am new to the trade world and would be interested in trading several T-cards I have in various grades for either SGC T-cards or just about anything! These cards are all duplicates in my sets and my "needs/wants" can be found on the SGC Registry. I am also open to offers involving, well, whatever you may have! Here's the group: 

T205 Robert Harmon, Both Ears Show, SGC 20/1.5...$30
T205 John Berry, SGC 10/1....$22
T206 Kaiser Wilhelm, Hands at Chest, SGC 20/1.5....TRADED.
T207 Hugh Bradley, Recruit, SGC 40/3............Sold
T207 John Miller, Recruit, SGC 40/3..............TRADED
T207 Edgar Lennox, Recruit, SGC 40/3.............TRADED


[IMG]http://i175.photobucket.com/albums/w153/bamacollection/harmon011.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i175.photobucket.com/albums/w153/bamacollection/harmonback012.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i175.photobucket.com/albums/w153/bamacollection/barry013.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i175.photobucket.com/albums/w153/bamacollection/barryback014.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i175.photobucket.com/albums/w153/bamacollection/wilhelm015.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i175.photobucket.com/albums/w153/bamacollection/wilhelmback016.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i175.photobucket.com/albums/w153/bamacollection/bradley027.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i175.photobucket.com/albums/w153/bamacollection/bradleyback028.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i175.photobucket.com/albums/w153/bamacollection/miller029.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i175.photobucket.com/albums/w153/bamacollection/millerback030.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i175.photobucket.com/albums/w153/bamacollection/lennox031.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i175.photobucket.com/albums/w153/bamacollection/lennoxback032.jpg[/IMG]

All offers are welcome !!!
